cage package¶

Submodules¶

cage.facetsym module¶

class cage.facetsym.Cage(species, coords, charge=0, spin_multiplicity=None, validate_proximity=False, site_properties=None)[source]¶

Bases: pymatgen.core.structure.Molecule

A Cage is a molecule that is sort of shaped as a fullerene, based of the Molecule class from pymatgen.

__init__(species, coords, charge=0, spin_multiplicity=None, validate_proximity=False, site_properties=None)[source]¶

Creates a Mutable Molecule Cage, specifically designed to work on the facets etc.

The Cage molecule is automatically centered on its center of mass.

Parameters:
  • (list) (species) – List of atomic species. Possible kinds of input include a list of dict of elements/species and occupancies, a List of elements/specie specified as actual Element/Specie, Strings (“Fe”, “Fe2+”) or atomic numbers (1,56).
  • (3x1 array) (coords) – list of cartesian coordinates of each species.
  • (float) – Charge for the molecule. Defaults to 0.
append(species, coords, validate_proximity=True, properties=None)[source]¶

Overwrite the append method of the Molecule class, in order to remove the symmetry operations after the site has been appended. :param species: :param coords: :param validate_proximity: :param properties: :return:

facets¶

Surface facets of the Cage. :return:

find_facet_paths()[source]¶

Find the non equivalent pathways between connected facets of the cage molecule. The facets can be connected by sharing an edge, or a vertex. :return:

find_noneq_facets()[source]¶

Find all of the nonequivalent facets of the Cage.

Returns:List of Facets

Find the Schoenflies PointGroup of the Cage molecule. :return: PointGroup object

redefine_surface(ignore_elements)[source]¶

The standard surface of the Cage class ignores hydrogen and lithium. This method allows the user to redefine the surface of the Cage, by telling it which elements to ignore in the determination of the surface. :param ignore_elements: :return:

symmops¶

The symmetry operations of the Cage. :return: List of

Writes the Cage to a POSCAR file.

Bases: monty.json.MSONable
